name: Tempered Cashew Yogurt, Spiced Potatoes and Bell Peppers with Indian Flat bread (Kadhi, Aloo Shimla Mirch, Roti)! Vegan.
description: Tempered Cashew Yogurt, Spiced Potatoes and Bell Peppers with Indian Flat Bread (Kadhi, Aloo Shimla Mirch, Roti)! Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon raw sugar or jaggery or maple syrup to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add the oil and heat on medium heat for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the mustard seeds and be careful when they sputter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asofetida(hing), curry leaves and fenugreek seeds and mix for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asofetida(hing), curry leaves and fenugreek seeds and mix for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the ginger, chopped chili and turmeric and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in 2-3 tablespoons of water to bring the temperature down so the yogurt doesnt sputter and separate.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the yogurt, salt and sugar /jaggery and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water if you like the consistency to be a bit thin and give it a boil. For variations add 1 Tablespoon chickpea flour mixed in a little water along with the yogurt.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce heat to low, taste and adjust for salt and spice. Keep stirring till the yogurt just about starts to bubble. Add lemon juice if you want it a little sour.!
